text: No person connected with me by blood or marriage will be appointed to office.
author: Rutherford B. Hayes

text: In a sacred ground like marriage, you find yourself out of it at certain times for reasons unknown that can be destructive. There could be a demon that kind of comes out and overtakes you.
author: David Boreanaz

text: I think that, as with marriage, you just know when it's time to have kids.
author: Ashley Judd

text: Marriage is about the most expensive way for the average man to get laundry done.
author: Burt Reynolds

text: American couples have gone to such lengths to avoid the interference of in-laws that they have to pay marriage counselors to interfere between them.
author: Florence King
